parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description:
The new accelerated domain name.

Only primary domain names are supported, such as `example.net`.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the Global Accelerator (GA) instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: TargetDomain
parameters.description: The accelerated domain name to be modified.
